title: League of Legends MCP Server
description:
Connect AI assistants to your League of Legends data.

## Setup

1. Enter your **Riot API Key** below (get one at https://developer.riotgames.com)
2. Select your **region** and click **Save**
3. In Claude Desktop → Settings → Connectors → Add Custom Connector:
   `https://scrapmania--lol-mcp-server.apify.actor/mcp?token=YOUR_APIFY_TOKEN`

## Example Prompts
- "Show me the profile of Faker#KR1"
- "Analyze my last 20 ranked games"
- "Compare my stats on Jinx vs Caitlyn"
- "Give me tips to climb from Gold to Platinum"
